sequence:
An Easily Flustered Girl's Story

<size=45>Chapter 3 - You've Got a Friend in Me!</size>

scripts.say: Honolulu, Leander, and I went to a caf√© that I frequent.
Thanks for inviting me, Leander.
Not at all, it's my pleasure.
... But why are YOU here, Commander?

options.content: Say hello, this time with more energy

scripts.say: *Sigh*... Whatever, I can't muster the energy to care anymore...

Well, I first asked the Commander about us going here together, then the Commander told me "I really want to sit next to Honolulu," and since I too wish to get to know you better, I decided to invite you both.
... (Whispering) Yeah, there is...
Honolulu averted her gaze from me. She seemed displeased.
Um... I ordered a slice of cake for each of us. I hope you'll find it delectable.
The 3 of us sat down and enjoyed some good cake and afternoon tea.
... Ah, that reminds me: it seems you don't socialize much with other girls, Honolulu. Is there a reason for that?
... Yeah. It's because that's just the way I am.
Leander's question seemed to make Honolulu a little unhappy.
That's rather unfortunate... You're such a beautiful and wonderful person. You shouldn't be ashamed of who you are.
B-beautiful...? Me...?
Yes! Even your service record is something to admire. I've always wanted to get to know you better.
I'm certain that other people too would come to understand your splendor if you'd sit down and have a chat with them like this.
You are so splendid, in fact, that I would honestly say it makes me a little jealous.
...... T-thank you...
Hearing that, Honolulu's expression turned bright red and she began acting fidgety. Maybe nobody has ever praised her so much before.
I knew it was a good idea to invite Honolulu.
... W-why are you looking at me like you just made some kind of breakthrough...
Stupid jerk...
Honolulu averted her gaze from me again. This time she seemed embarrassed.
